name: Qwilfish
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.

abilities.name: Counterattack Quills
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.
